body:
Ok, so i have seen some other servers with a rank like this and i thought that it would be great if Avicus would do it too.

The rank is called: Assistant or Helper, and they basically answer any questions that people have and help them with their needs

This would benefit the community quite greatly so that everyone can learn more about Avicus and rules, etc.

To apply (just what i think the requirements should be) you must have at least 5 days on Avicus and should be able to take a general knowledge test on Avicus.

Thanks :D
body_tagged:
Ok, so i have seen some other servers with a rank like this and i thought that it would be great if Avicus would do it too.

The rank is called: Assistant or Helper, and they basically answer any questions that people have and help them with their needs

This would benefit the community quite greatly so that everyone can learn more about Avicus and rules, etc.

To apply (just what i think the requirements should be) you must have at least 5 days on Avicus and should be able to take a general knowledge test on Avicus.

Thanks :D
title: Idea for new rank?

replies.body:
I already answer people's questions all the time and have a fair understanding of the rules.
Your prerequisites for this rank are insanely easy to meet, which is why it won't work.

We don't need another staff rank, we have too many as is and this 'Helper' rank will literally serve no purpose.

Also, other servers may have a 'Helper' rank, but on Avicus, the equivalent of the 'Helper' rank is the 'Junior Moderator' rank.
replies.body_tagged:
I already answer people's questions all the time and have a fair understanding of the rules.
Your prerequisites for this rank are insanely easy to meet, which is why it won't work.

We don't need another staff rank, we have too many as is and this 'Helper' rank will literally serve no purpose.

Also, other servers may have a 'Helper' rank, but on Avicus, the equivalent of the 'Helper' rank is the 'Junior Moderator' rank.

replies.body:
Referees and Media do not serve the same purpose.

Refs are in charge of making sure the match goes smoothly, they monitor every player in the match and they make sure everyone is constantly playing by the rules throughout the entire duration of the match.

Livestreamers push a record button.

Livestreamers push a record button.

replies.body:
I've gone a long way
I wasn't doubting your ability to stream.

If you think its that easy you are a clown. It was difficult learning the aspects of obs and streaming.
Don't name call. Also, I never said it wasn't difficult.

For the record, its a start streaming button. Obviously don't know anything on our side.
I am quite aware of that, the reason why I said livestreamers "hit a record button" is because the simplicity of that comment shows my disapproval of the rank. Of course, you don't just press one button and you're done xD
If you think that's what I meant then that's a bit stupid.

Look, I'm not saying that you specifically aren't good at your job, I'm saying the Media rank should not exist because as a whole, it serves very little purpose.
Don't take it personally. My comments have nothing to do with you personally.
It's about the Media rank, not your personal abilities to stream.

For the record, its a start streaming button. Obviously don't know anything on our side.

If you think that's what I meant then that's a bit stupid.

Look, I'm not saying that you specifically aren't good at your job, I'm saying the Media rank should not exist because as a whole, it serves very little purpose.
Don't take it personally. My comments have nothing to do with you personally.
It's about the Media rank, not your personal abilities to stream.
